Articles.Content: Yes, check the last page I just posted it and am too lazy to do it again. HYYYYYPE
Wait, I thought the .24 one was like 207 pages or something? Not 300 something.
Also, if you're a robot, 01101111 pages.
Oh 298, my mistake

> 
> Wait, I thought the .24 one was like 207 pages or something? Not 300 something.

It was 298 pages.

> 
> Wait, I thought the .24 one was like 207 pages or something? Not 300 something.

Two hundred and ninety freaking eight.

> 
> Only 111 more pages till we overtake .24

Keep posting everyone, we need to get this HypeTrain to the 1.0 station at speeds which it was never able to achieve before!
Lets extend this hype train! Cant wait till 1.0!
this is crazy. I keep reloading my browser and another page is created...
We just did a page in like 1 minute... So only a couple of hours till we overtake .24, at this rate we could hit 1000!
What time of day do they normally release?
Even three people got in before that last comment before me...

More images of the hype:

More HYPE! for a good cause.

> 
> What time of day do they normally release?

Not quite sure, dude. I think midnight central Mexico time. Or something like that.

> 
> Not quite sure, dude. I think midnight central Mexico time. Or something like that.

Butbut.... that's......like........FOREVER!

> 
> Not quite sure, dude. I think midnight central Mexico time. Or something like that.

Hm, Midnight tonight or tomorrow night?

Hey, everyone, why are we so hyped? Release is most defiantly not going to happen for about 20 hours, I say we all just calm down and reflect on how far this game has come.![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

.\_.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-26T22:40:11Z" title="04/26/2015 10:40  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 26, 2015</time> by RocketPilot573**
Adding hype...

> 
> Hey, everyone, why are we so hyped? Release is most defiantly not going to happen for about 20 hours, I say we all just calm down and reflect on how far this game has come.![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Do you have a ticket? Because it doesn't sound like you are on the right train!

> 
> Hey, everyone, why are we so hyped? Release is most defiantly not going to happen for about 20 hours, I say we all just calm down and reflect on how far this game has come.![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

That's not how hype works though.

> 
> Hey, everyone, why are we so hyped? Release is most defiantly not going to happen for about 20 hours, I say we all just calm down and reflect on how far this game has come.![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Oh stop with your petty rationality.

3 yrs 16 days. And it's been worth every second ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) > > Release is most defiantly not going to happen for about 20 hours Nyaa nyaa I can't hear you I can't hear you
Looks like squad is performing a server migration directly before release.

> 
> Hey, everyone, why are we so hyped? Release is most defiantly not going to happen for about 20 hours, I say we all just calm down and reflect on how far this game has come.![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Calm reflection on the HypeTrain? No way, *plus*, it's Monday somewhere now.
